com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class ReviveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.ReviveManager

  • public class ReviveManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class monitors a PlanCoordinator and revives offers when appropriate.
